tool_description: Segments customers based on their review patterns, rating behaviors, and engagement levels to identify different customer types and preferences.

review_ids.description: List of review IDs for customer analysis

segmentation_criteria.description: Criteria for segmentation: frequency, rating_pattern, sentiment, review_length

number_of_segments.description: Target number of customer segments to create

min_reviews_per_customer.description: Minimum reviews required per customer for inclusion

error_messages: Empty review data: review_ids array cannot be empty
Invalid segmentation criteria: Use combination of [frequency, rating_pattern, sentiment, review_length]
Invalid segment count: number_of_segments must be between 2 and 10
Invalid minimum reviews: min_reviews_per_customer must be a positive integer
Insufficient customer data: Too few customers meet the minimum review threshold for segmentation
usage: Provide review IDs and specify segmentation criteria and target number of segments. Returns customer segments with characteristics and membership.

segment_sizes.description: Number of customers in each segment

segment_characteristics.description: Key characteristics and behaviors of each segment

total_customers_analyzed.description: Total number of customers included in segmentation
